name: Searing Shot
description: Searing hot flames lick out at creatures in a 20 foot circle, centered on you. Any creature in range must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking 4d4 + MOVE fire damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. If a target fails the save by 5 or more, it is burned.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.

contest.effect: An appealing move that can be used repeatedly without boring the audience.
